programme.title: Deadly Women
programme.desc: No one doubts a woman’s capacity to love, but sometimes lust can turn lethal. In the ultimate fatal attraction, "Deadly Women" looks at cases of murder driven by obsessive love.

programme.title: Deadly Women
programme.desc: Greed is one of the oldest motives for murder, and these deadly women are no exception: they’ll do anything to satisfy their need for cash. This is the dangerous world of the fortune hunters.

programme.title: Deadly Women
programme.desc: The path towards revenge can sometimes lead to murder. It can be quick, fiery and violent. It can also be a dish served cold, the product of a calm, calculated plot.

programme.title: Deadly Women
programme.desc: While their sisters chose a life of sensible, suburban motherhood, these deadly women chose a life of crime. They lived with the thrills, the danger and the deadly consequences of being outlaws.

programme.title: Deadly Women
programme.desc: We want to believe that all women would give their lives to protect their children. But there are horrifying cases when a mother will turn against her natural instinct and kill her own flesh and blood.

programme.title: Deadly Women: Deadly Possessions
programme.desc: A grandmother caring for her grandchildren, a young girl in love with a boy, and a mother protecting her son are consumed with intense love. But when that love is threatened, they find it too much to bear and take measures into their own hands.

programme.title: The FBI Files: The Killing Zone
programme.desc: In the 1990's the war on drugs was in full swing. The front lines were often America's inner cities where gangs use violence and murder to rule their empires.

programme.title: The FBI Files: Crime Spree
programme.desc: They swept through six states like a plague, thrill killers acting without rhyme or reason. They targeted adults and young girls, kidnapping, and murdering. And in their rampage, they left plenty of clues, but moving targets are the hardest to hit.

programme.title: The FBI Files: The World Trade Center Bombing
programme.desc: Terrorist bombings are what happen in other countries. Not here in the United States. And yet, in 1993, it happened in New York City.

programme.title: The FBI Files: Human Prey
programme.desc: Thomas Dillon killed five outdoorsmen at random over a period of three years in rural southern Ohio. After a tip led the FBI to the murder weapon, ballistic testing made a match.

programme.title: The FBI Files: The C-11 Squad
programme.desc: New York City is not stranger to gang violence. But when a 12-year-old child was kidnapped, the gangs had crossed a line. Law enforcement raced to find the missing boy before it was too late.

programme.title: Worzel Gummidge Down Under

programme.desc: When 12 year old Agnes Ali'iva'a drowned in a ditch in 1992, the police initially thought her death was accidental. It was four years before public and political pressure forced police to re-investigate her death.

programme.title: Sensing Murder: When The Trail Goes Cold
programme.desc: This episodes involves the disappearance of 62-year-old Kaye Stewart, a woman who went missing while on a short walk on June 13th, 2005.

programme.title: Sensing Murder: The Patient Killer
programme.desc: In 1976, thirteen-year-old schoolgirl Tracey Ann Patient was plucked off Auckland's Great North Road. The following morning, her body was found dumped 16 km away in the Waitakere Ranges, having been strangled with a pantyhose tourniquet.

programme.title: Sensing Murder: The Lie of the Land
programme.desc: Sue Nicholson and Deb Webber investigate one of the most complex and intriguing cases ever featured - did Waikato man Jason Dark commit suicide or was he murdered, as his family believes?

programme.title: Crime Investigation Australia: The Disappearance of Donald Mackay
programme.desc: A small group of local criminals with mafia connections were making vast fortunes in the famous NSW Riverina irrigation district from marijuana plantations.

programme.title: Crime Investigation Australia: The Greenough Family Massacre
programme.desc: The small hamlet of Greenough, near Geraldton in Western Australia, some 400 kilometres north of Perth, will forever be associated with one the most horrific murders in Australian criminal history.

programme.title: Crime Investigation Australia: Death in a Heartbeat / The Body in the Bag
programme.desc: CI examines the Dr. Victor Chang extortion murder as well as the horrific Jane Doe Case where a girl is found lying on the side of the road of an inner Sydney suburb wrapped in two plastic garbage bags.

programme.title: Crime Investigation Australia: The Wanda Beach Murders / The Beaumont Children Mystery
programme.desc: In 1965, when Australian teenage culture was centred on sun, sand, and surf, the nation was shocked by the brutal bashing, rape and murder of two 15-year-old girls in the sand hills at Sydney's Wanda Beach.

programme.title: McLeod's Daughters: The Bore War
programme.desc: Summer has brought the water table so low there isn't enough for both Claire's stock and Nick's crops. The women suffer from not being able to shower.

programme.title: McLeod's Daughters: Hello Stranger
programme.desc: Meg's world is thrown into turmoil at the sudden return of her first love, the man she gave her heart to and the man she's told everyone, Jodi included, walked out on her.

programme.title: McLeod's Daughters: A Dry Spell
programme.desc: Meg is faced with a difficult decision: to stay at the place she loves or to leave with the man she loves.

programme.title: McLeod's Daughters: Three's A Crowd
programme.desc: Harry yearns to know all about Peter Johnson who seems to be settling in at Drovers Run. His background check turns up a surprise, but unable to inform Claire himself, he tells Becky who must decide what to do with the information.

programme.title: McLeod's Daughters: The Bridle Waltz
programme.desc: Harry guilt-trips Becky into telling Claire that Peter is married. Liz tries to reconcile Harry and the boys. Tess decides to leave Drovers Run and work in the café with Simon and Briny.

programme.title: Undercover Boss USA
programme.desc: Lynne Zappone, the Chief Talent Officer of Popeye’s Louisiana Kitchen, a restaurant chain that generates more than $2 billion in annual revenue, goes undercover posing as a participant in a reality show called Job Swap.

programme.title: Undercover Boss Canada
programme.desc: PJ’s Pets is one of the nation’s oldest pet store chains, but the company has a new President in place, and she’s determined to rattle a few cages. Margaret Kordas steps out of her stilettos when she spends a week working in her own stores.

programme.title: Undercover Boss USA
programme.desc: Dan Dizio is the CEO of the fastest growing pretzel bakery on the East Coast, Philly Pretzel Factory. Dan goes undercover as Michael Downs, a data entry processor who will be switching jobs with Philly Pretzel employees.

programme.title: Undercover Boss Canada
programme.desc: Lisa Lisson, the first female president of FedEx Express Canada, goes undercover to find out if her employees have the right resources to provide exceptional service in the fiercely competitive courier industry.

programme.title: Undercover Boss Canada
programme.desc: Pizza Pizza CEO Paul Goddard goes undercover in the nation’s number one pizza mega brand, and learns that making dough and delivering pizza serves up some challenges he never imagined.

programme.title: Undercover Boss USA
programme.desc: Rick Tigner, the president of Kendall-Jackson Wine Estates, the second largest family owned wine company in the world, goes undercover posing as a grocery store employee who is pursuing his dream job in the wine industry.

programme.title: Ghost Hunters: Episode 5
programme.desc: Despite mysterious and unnerving warnings from locals, the Ghost Hunters face their fears and stay on mission: to help people confront terrifying paranormal encounters that have shaken them to their core.

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: Family Man
programme.desc: Dog and family head to Kona to track down a wanted father who's looking to bolt to the mainland to evade sentencing. Meanwhile, Dog does some evading of his own - Avoiding the much dreaded birthday party!

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: All in the Family
programme.desc: Dog and the team need to help Leland hunt down some elusive fugitives. The case is a family affair with both mother and daughter in trouble with the law.

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: Mother Courage
programme.desc: Dog knows that crime and drugs not only damage victims but also harm the families of the perpetrators, especially the kids. And both of the fugitives he's chasing today have left shattered families and struggling women in their wake.

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: Bounty Boot Camp
programme.desc: Jim is a bondsman and longtime friend of Dog. Jim's son has just started in the family business. Today, Jim has asked Dog to track down a potentially dangerous fugitive, and take his son along for some training with the best in the world.

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: Friends and Neighbors
programme.desc: Dog and his posse head to Colorado for a special mission, to catch Marco, an alleged drug dealer. It's been ten months since Marco went on the lam, and his bondsman stands to lose his family business if Marco is not caught.

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: The Set-Up
programme.desc: The trail is hot and the stakes is high for Dog and the posse. The "Big Fish" in this case is Marco, an alleged drug dealer with a big bond. But a major key to catching him is Elizabeth, who is also a fugitive from the law.

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: Sweatin' Bullets
programme.desc: When a heat wave envelops West Monroe the air conditioning unit at the Duck Commander warehouse goes down, turning the duck call assembly room into a boiling sweatshop.

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: Spring Pong Cleaning
programme.desc: After Korie decides the junk piles in the Duck Commander warehouse are beginning to reach critical mass, she calls on Willie and the guys to do a little company spring-cleaning.

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: Good Morning, West Monroe
programme.desc: After attending a local radio show as a guest, Willie sees an opportunity to host a show of his own.

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: Of Mattresses and Men
programme.desc: The Jase, Si and the guys from the duck call room take a field trip to a brand new local donut shop and quickly find out who amongst them can eat the most delicious treats.

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: Samurai Si
programme.desc: Willie receives a special gift from a Japanese business associate - a "priceless" samurai sword, which Willie keeps out of the hands of Jase and the guys.

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: Duck No, We Won't Go
programme.desc: Willie pushes his work force too far after implementing new "motivational work tactics," and the guys rise up against him and go on strike.

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: Drag Me To Glory
programme.desc: When NASCAR sensation Clint Bowyer pays a visit to the Duck Commander warehouse, Willie and the guys are fired up to spend the day hanging out with the professional racecar driver.

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: Duck Season Eve
programme.desc: Tomorrow is the opening day of Duck Season and the men are carrying on their tradition of camping on the Robertson Land the night before.

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: Can't Hardly Weight
programme.desc: Gearing up for his high school reunion, Willie realizes that he could stand to lose a few pounds. Jase and Korie set out to help him drop some weight and the strenuous battle of man-versus-waistline begins.

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: Shot Thru The Heart
programme.desc: The guys learn from Willie that John Luke is going through his first break up. In order to make him feel better the men decide to take John Luke hunting for nutria, and impart their relationship wisdom.

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: Here Lizard, Lizard
programme.desc: When the warehouse guys new office pet (a lizard) escapes, they try all they can in order to catch the wily reptile. Proving impossible, the guys finally decide to bring in the big guns to help trap it--Mr. Phil Robertson.

programme.title: Behind Bars: The World's Toughest Prisons: San Pedro Prison, La Paz, Bolivia
programme.desc: Imagine a prison so fierce that guards stay outside for fear of their lives. Inside, the prisoners are in control: murderers, violent offenders, drug bosses. The inmates rule and anarchy prevails. Only the strongest survive this lawless place.

programme.title: Behind Bars: The World's Toughest Prisons: Dallas County Jail, Dallas. Texas, USA
programme.desc: The Dallas County Jail in Texas - a supersized facility with beds for 7,100 inmates. The biggest threat in the prison? Turf wars. With the surplus of inmates, there is less space to divide up between them, leading to relentless gang warfare.

programme.title: Behind Bars: The World's Toughest Prisons: Sofia Central Prison, Sofia, Bulgaria
programme.desc: With a crumbling foundation fit for demolition, Sofia Central prison is inhospitable for anyone, including criminals. With multiple prisoner cells, bunks stacked 3 high and horrid isolation cells, prisoners live idly behind bars for 23 hours a day.

programme.title: Behind Bars: The World's Toughest Prisons: Miami, Dade County Jail Boot Camp, Miami, Florida, USA
programme.desc: The toughest divisions of the Miami Dade: Boot Camp gives minor offenders a chance to escape the prison through unforgiving drills and rules. To many it is a better alternative to The M-D County Jail where murderers and rapists have their own rules.

programme.title: Behind Bars: The World's Toughest Prisons
programme.desc: Colony 100 – Ukraine’s prison for hardened criminals is marked by an omnipresent hopelessness.

programme.title: Divorce Court: Runaway Love Part 2
programme.desc: After 21 years together, LaSonya claims her husband still can’t keep his pants zipped and quit the flirting. Daniea Lanier says he is fed up with her attitude and feels she would be happier if she had more self-esteem.

programme.title: Divorce Court: Enough Is Enough
programme.desc: Dwight has had it with Roxy's mental abuse. Dwight says Roxy has cost him multiple jobs because she's constantly harassing him at work, but she says he needs to give her the attention she deserves! Can Judge Toler help them see eye to eye?

programme.title: Divorce Court: All Eyes on Me
programme.desc: Selina is sleepless in Sarasota, lying awake in the night, calling her boyfriend Derrick to make sure he’s alone. He admits he sees other women, but doesn’t consider it cheating because he’s not having sex. How much longer can Selina play detective?

programme.title: Divorce Court: Cheating Husband
programme.desc: Corey has cheated on his wife with 27 women and wants a divorce because he can't trust her. She cheated once and can't get over how she hid it from him. He also argues that his 27 times were purely physical, but hers was an emotional affair.

programme.title: Divorce Court: Secret Lies
programme.desc: Billy wants Marylu to quit pole dancing and stripping, while she wants Billy to confess if he’s straight or not. Billy has a fetish for wearing women’s underwear and he needs to fess up if he likes women, men or both.

programme.title: Divorce Court: Like a Virgin
programme.desc: Emily is 29 and a virgin. The pressure from her boyfriend Romeo to have sex is overwhelming. Their 20 year age difference may be part of the problem because she chats it up more with strangers than him. Can Judge Toler help them find common ground?

programme.title: Divorce Court: Players Club
programme.desc: When this couple met on the internet, they instantly hit it off. Though, when Ray found out Raina was creating sexy videos for pay, he wasn’t so keen. He believes that she is meeting up with her followers and having relations for more money.

programme.title: Divorce Court: Stay with Me Part 1
programme.desc: Johnnie says she suspects Henri of cheating now because he acts indifferent and doesn’t come home most nights. Henri points the finger back claiming Johnnie's not only a cheater, but also enables her family members and has developed a gambling habit.

programme.title: Divorce Court: Stay with Me Part 2
programme.desc: Johnnie says she suspects Henri of cheating now because he acts indifferent and doesn’t come home most nights. Henri points the finger back claiming Johnnie's not only a cheater, but also enables her family members and has developed a gambling habit.

programme.title: Divorce Court: My Money
programme.desc: Barbara says Alicia is a cheater and a thief. Barbara's seen Alicia’s text messages from men and asserts she is verbally abusive and financially irresponsible. Alicia says Barbara is controlling, a liar, selfish and never committed to their marriage.

programme.title: Divorce Court: Not Man Enough
programme.desc: No matter how hard Demont tries, he's always looking up at the bar Reasha keeps raising. Demont got a promotion and relocated for work, which raised her suspicions of him cheating. Can this couple ignite the spark or is this relationship totaled?

programme.title: Divorce Court: Speak My Truth
programme.desc: Chante says her boyfriend, Steve of 8 years is trying to end her “hot girl summer.” Not only that, but he doesn’t trust her, is controlling and wants to marry her. Chante isn’t ready for marriage and just wants to have fun.

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: Surprise Ending
programme.desc: Dog and the boys are going after a fugitive with a $25,000 bond and a string of theft charges behind him. When the team hits his apartment, they find a boot print on the door, a souvenir of a police raid from only days earlier?

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: The Big Wipe-Out
programme.desc: A Hawaiian surfing hero is on a wave to nowhere and it's Dog's turn to play lifeguard. "Buttons," known throughout the islands for his prowess on the waves and his daring 360's, has wiped-out on the rocky shoals of drug addiction.

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: You Can Bet On It!
programme.desc: Kristine had a string of gambling and forgery charges before she jumped bail leaving Dog "holding the bag". Now it's time for Dog to call in some chits of his own, getting the help of trusty informants he's helped out over the years.

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: Fly Boy
programme.desc: Dog told him not to go, but Charles went anyway, skipping to Oregon against the terms of his bail. Now Dog has a tip that Charles plans to slip back into Honolulu. With $30,000 on the line Dog knows he can leave little to chance.

programme.title: Operation Repo starts 9pm
programme.desc: STARTS 9PM Take a ride along with Operation Repo! This docudrama series takes an in-depth look at the professional, but sometimes murky world of car repossession. Get ready for the drama!

programme.title: Operation Repo starts 9pm
programme.desc: STARTS 9PM Take a ride along with Operation Repo! This docudrama series takes an in-depth look at the professional, but sometimes murky world of car repossession. Get ready for the drama!

programme.title: Operation Repo starts 9pm
programme.desc: STARTS 9PM Take a ride along with Operation Repo! This docudrama series takes an in-depth look at the professional, but sometimes murky world of car repossession. Get ready for the drama!

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: Guns & Ice
programme.desc: The following day is Dog's birthday but that won't stop him from chasing a fugitive, who is facing firearms charges. Dog doesn't relish the thought of going after an alleged gunslinger on his birthday but he's never one to avoid a challenge.

programme.title: Operation Repo starts 9pm
programme.desc: STARTS 9PM Take a ride along with Operation Repo! This docudrama series takes an in-depth look at the professional, but sometimes murky world of car repossession. Get ready for the drama!

programme.title: Operation Repo starts 9pm
programme.desc: Take a ride along with Operation Repo! This docudrama series takes an in-depth look at the professional, but sometimes murky world of car repossession. Get ready for the drama!

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: The Good Fight
programme.desc: Dog and Beth have to be at the state capitol bright and early to receive an award for their fight against ice in Hawaii. Afterwards, they're inspired to start the hunt for Shanna, an alleged ice user and identity thief with $80,000 in bonds.

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: The Smackdown of Baby Lyssa
programme.desc: After meeting with the cosigner on a bond for a man named John, Dog and the Posse hatch a plan to lure him to a high rise apartment. But when night falls, their plan leaves a member of the team alone and in harm's way!

programme.title: Operation Repo: Natural Liar
programme.desc: Froy and Sonia encounter a city employee who tries to give them the boot, and a mechanic's shady scheme comes crashing down on Matt and Ronnie. But with Froy still in debt to Sonia, an RO's offer to make a quick buck convinces Froy to break the first rule

programme.title: Operation Repo: The Froylan Job
programme.desc: A hoarder with a secret tries to pull a fast one on Matt and Froy, and Sonia takes sides in a dramatic lover's quarrel. Froy finally gets a shot at recovering the Lamborghini, but will his ingenious plan come crashing down around him?

programme.title: Operation Repo: Tricks and Treats
programme.desc: First, a mischievous magician gets Ronnie and Carlos to stick together when they interrupt his show to grab his car. Next, Froy and Ronnie have to put their hands on a seriously stupid sugar daddy and the recently upgraded debtor's chest.

programme.title: Girlfriends: Loose Lips Sink Relationships
programme.desc: Joan opens her mouth and tells Greg about Toni and Clay.

programme.title: Girlfriends: Jamaic-Up?
programme.desc: Joan takes the girls to the Sinbad Music Festival to help ease Toni to get over her breakup with Greg.

programme.title: Girlfriends: The Fallout
programme.desc: The ladies return home from their very eventful trip to Jamaica where Joan unintentionally ruined Toni's relationship.

programme.title: Girlfriends: Just Say No
programme.desc: Joan continues to suffer in her troubled friendship with Toni and her new relationship with her therapist, Dr. Bales.

programme.title: Girlfriends: A Full Court Conspiracy
programme.desc: Torn between her two worlds, Joan struggles with her professional duty while at the same time dealing with the guilt that she is not being true to herself or her beliefs.

programme.title: Girlfriends: Un-Treatable
programme.desc: Maya buys a dress that is too expensive knowing it might cause problems with her husband, Darnell. Joan treats herself to a trip to New York to visit her boyfriend, realizing the distance between the two of them is a problem.

programme.title: Girlfriends: Buh-Bye
programme.desc: Joan ends the friendship between her and Toni after finding out that Toni has been discussing her personal life with co-workers behind her back. Meanwhile, Lynn is trying to cope with her new living situation with Vosco, and his lack of a job.

programme.title: Girlfriends: Willie or Won’t He
programme.desc: Yvonne is concerned that William is never going to marry her because they have not set a date for the wedding. When Yvonne asks Joan for advice, Joan tries her best to stay out of it but ends up telling Yvonne to move in with William first to try it out.

programme.title: Tyler Perry's Sistas: From The Balcony
programme.desc: The dating game has Danni at a disadvantage when her feelings get the best of her. Andi tries to be strong for Gary. Karen stands strong on her principles. (S1, ep21)

programme.title: Paranormal State: Spirits of the Slave Dungeon
programme.desc: Ryan books a two-night case in a real haunted jail in Charleston, SC, but PRS soon realizes the spirits themselves are being held there against their will and subjected to an unjust form of torture.

programme.title: Paranormal State: Dead Legends
programme.desc: PRS and Psychic/Medium Chip Coffey investigate the famed Hotel Conneaut in northern Pennsylvania. Heavy doors opening on their own, sightings of a boy, a bride and a menacing butcher have the hotel's staff on edge.

programme.title: Paranormal State: Laws of Attraction
programme.desc: When Paula's young autistic son Michael, with limited verbal skills uttered the words "Go away scary dead boy" -- it sent a chill up her spine.

programme.title: Paranormal State: Vendetta
programme.desc: P.R.S. investigates claims of supernatural revenge in the Pennsylvania Poconos. When a client's new boyfriend moves in, does the paranormal move in with him? Or did her ex put a hex on her house and the entire family?

programme.title: Paranormal State: The Drowned
programme.desc: Kim and her family have been frightened out of their seaside Maryland home. Multiple family members have reported sightings of children with purple lips and strange noises emanating from the nearby creek.

programme.title: Paranormal State: School House Haunting
programme.desc: PRS travels to Massachusetts to investigate an old schoolhouse where children's voices disturb a couple who've made it their home.

programme.title: Paranormal State: The Cemetery
programme.desc: PRS visits a gothic graveyard, where a jealous spirit seems to be preying on the newlywed wife of the cemetery's caretaker. Ryan traces the haunting to a mysterious, unclaimed cremation urn on the grounds.

programme.title: Paranormal State: The Devil in Syracuse
programme.desc: The clients are new, but the spirit is all too familiar as Ryan Buell prepares himself to battle the taunting demon that has been following him.

programme.title: Paranormal State: Satan's Soldier
programme.desc: Mark and Kim can't sleep through the racket caused by unseen forces in their central Indiana home. When PRS and Psychic/Medium Michelle Belanger discover what appears to be blood in the basement, they investigate a history of violence in the home.

programme.title: Paranormal State: Mothman
programme.desc: Ryan takes his team to Point Pleasant, West Virginia to investigate his own personal holy grail of paranormal lore: the mysterious Mothman.

programme.title: Most Haunted: Unseen: Armely Mills Cottage
programme.desc: The cottage on the site of Armley Mills is said to be full of paranormal activity so Karl decides to enter, alone and witnesses something that is eager to grab his attention.

programme.title: Most Haunted: Unseen: Shrewsbury Prison
programme.desc: Abandoned prisons are always a daunting prospect and the Most Haunted team love them. This time Karl takes on HMP Shrewsbury alone and experiences some of the unhappy phantoms that lurk in the shadows.

programme.title: Most Haunted: Unseen: Samlesbury Hall P1
programme.desc: With a history dating back to 1185, Salmesbury Hall is of the UK’s most historic buildings and said to be one of the most haunted. With ghost stories and sightings all over the building, Stuart investigates the ground floor.

programme.title: Most Haunted: Unseen: Samlesbury Hall P2
programme.desc: Karl investigates the upper floors of this historic building dating back to 1185, and realises he is not alone.

programme.title: Most Haunted: Unseen: Gressenhall Workhouse Pt1
programme.desc: Karl investigates the very haunted school room in the large imposing Gressenhall Workhouse. The activity starts even before Karl gets into the building and becomes one of the most impressive investigations to date.

programme.title: Most Haunted: Unseen: Gressenhall Workhouse Pt2
programme.desc: Stuart investigates two buildings, a forge and the cottage. He could not have imagined the activity that unfolded around him.

programme.title: Most Haunted: Unseen: Bishton Hall P1
programme.desc: Stuart investigates the main house and seems to be pulled in different directions from an unexplained energy.

programme.title: Most Haunted: Unseen: Bishton Hall P2
programme.desc: Karl ventures down into the cellars of this large country house and soon comes under attack from an unseen force.

programme.title: Highway to Heaven: A Dolphin Song for Lee - Part 1

programme.title: Arthur: Room to Ride/The Frensky Family Fiasco
programme.desc: With Lance Armstrong’s support, Binky and his friends take to the streets to convince residents to vote for new bike safety lanes. Francine wants the Frenskys to be closer, but a weekly Family Night turns out to be harder than expected.

programme.title: Arthur: The Contest/Prove It
programme.desc: What would happen if Arthur and his friends entered a contest to write stories for their favorite TV show? Then, look out world, D.W. has discovered science! But D.W.'s new-found passion proves that a little knowledge is a dangerous thing.

programme.title: Arthur: To Tibble the Truth/Waiting to Go
programme.desc: When the Tibble Twins' constant lying lands them in constant trouble, they promise to tell only the truth. Binky and Brain collide on the soccer field, breaking Brain's new watch and nearly breaking their friendship.

programme.title: Arthur: D.W.'S Imaginary Friend/Arthur's Lost Library Book
programme.desc: Someone only D.W. can see has moved in with the Reads. Her name is Nadine, and she follows D.W. everywhere. Arthur is the first to get the new Scare-Your-Pants-Off book from the library. Unfortunately, he can't figure out where he put it!

programme.title: Arthur: Arthur and The Real Mr. Ratburn/Arthur's Spelling Trubble
programme.desc: It's the first day of third grade and Arthur's biggest fear has come true--his new teacher is the dreaded Mr. Ratburn. Then, it’s time for the all-school spellathon. Arthur is chosen to compete, and he finds facing Prunella and The Brain!

programme.title: Arthur: Fernlets by Fern/Prunella and the Haunted Locker
programme.desc: Muffy talks Fern into writing poems for a new line of greeting cards which becomes the hit of Elwood City, but booming business causes Fern to burn out. Prunella is assigned a new school locker, which is rumored to be haunted!

programme.title: Arthur: D.W., All Fired Up/I'd Rather Read It Myself
programme.desc: When Ms. Morgan announces they'll be having a fire drill during preschool, D.W. wants no part of it--it sounds way too scary. Then, the Tibble Twins are better than D.W. at just about everything.

programme.title: Arthur: D.W. All Wet/Buster's Dino Dilemma
programme.desc: The Reads are having a wonderful time at the beach, except for D.W. who simply refuses to have fun. Next, Buster and Arthur make a long-awaited field trip to a dinosaur excavation.

programme.title: Arthur: The Blackout/Mei Lin Takes a Stand
programme.desc: It's a hot day in Elwood City, and a total blackout leaves its residents without electricity! Will Arthur and DW survive without AC and TV? Binky's baby sister Mei-Lin isn't keen on learning to walk and would rather stick to crawling.

programme.title: War Wrecks: The Untold Stories: The Tragic Sinking of Leopoldville
programme.desc: On the 24th of December 1944, 2 237 American soldiers of the 66th Infantry Division are aboard the Steamer Léopoldville.

programme.title: I Have Never Forgotten You
programme.desc: I Have Never Forgotten You provides an intimate portrait of famed Nazi hunter and humanitarian, Simon Wiesenthal. This rare biography looks closely at the sacrifices made by one of history's bravest and boldest.

programme.title: RAF: The Royal Air Force: Battle for the Skies
programme.desc: The series begins before WWI when military commanders struggled to understand what uses aviation might have. The Wright Brothers had been the first to fly a powered aircraft in controlled flight in 1903, but even by 1914 aircraft were still underpowered.

programme.title: RAF: The Royal Air Force: Battle for the Skies
programme.desc: The 1920s and 30s were uncertain times for the RAF as well as all other armed services. With peace came cuts in spending on new aircraft development.

programme.title: Catfish: The TV Show: Ayissha & Sydney
programme.desc: Sydney and Ayissha were in an online romance for years before Sydney revealed she is not who she says. But Ayissha still loves her and seeks Nev and Max's help. (S4, ep16)

programme.title: Catfish: The TV Show: Bianca & Brogan
programme.desc: When Brogan disappears from the Internet, then returns online after a year without question, Bianca wants to know what happened in the missing year.

programme.title: Catfish: The TV Show: Blaire & Markie
programme.desc: When Blaire's Instagram lover Markie broke her heart, she moved on. But now Markie is back and wants to meet. Blaire needs Nev and Max's help to make it happen and reveal Markie's secret. (S4, ep9)

programme.title: Catfish: The TV Show
programme.desc: Brendan loves McKenna, but failed attempts to connect have left him wondering if McKenna is for real. Nev teams with social media sensation Karrueche Tran to help Brendan uncover the truth. (S5, ep4)

programme.title: Catfish: The TV Show: Brittany & Bryon
programme.desc: Brittany finds love online with Bryon, a marine who may get deployed again to Iraq, she seeks Nev and Max's help before she runs out of time to discover if the perfect military man is real. (S4, ep19)

programme.title: Catfish: The TV Show
programme.desc: After months of intimate texts with Titus, a man she met online, Candice has decided to tell to her husband. But before she does, she asks Nev to help her find out who Titus really is! (S5, ep16)

programme.title: The Hills: No More Mr. Nice Guy / Stress And The City
programme.desc: After kissing Brody in Vegas, Lauren wonders what their status is. Testing it out at dinner, she tells Brody that she hasn't been on a date in weeks. Will he be next on the menu? (S3, ep11)

programme.title: The City: The Past Catches Up
programme.desc: When the gang goes to Miami for the weekend, Jay runs into his ex-girlfriend Danielle and Whitney wonders if the rumours about them might be true after all. (S1, ep10)

programme.title: The City: Fool Me Twice, Shame On Me
programme.desc: Whitney's crushed to learn that Jay's mysterious night out was spent with his ex-girlfriend, Danielle. Olivia steals the credit from Whitney when they style an ELLE cover shoot! (S1, ep11)

programme.title: The City: I'm Sorry Whit
programme.desc: When Jay finds out he's going on tour, Whitney isn't willing to give up on the relationship, but when Jay doesn't give her a choice their relationship ends in a tearful goodbye. (S1, ep12)

programme.title: The City: Finale
programme.desc: Fresh from a breakup with Jay, Whitney questions if she made the right decision leaving LA. An opportunity opens up at work, but Olivia is after the same position. (S1, ep13)

programme.title: The City: Sleeping With The Frenemy
programme.desc: Olivia's working at ELLE Magazine, but meets her match in co-worker Erin Kaplan. Whitney returns to work for Kelly Cutrone, &amp; an old friend's in town, looking to crash with her. (S1, ep14)

programme.title: The City: Working Girls
programme.desc: Whitney wonders if working with a friend is a good idea when Roxy steps out of line on day one. Olivia wins Joe Zee's approval on a new project at ELLE, but Erin isn't impressed. (S1, ep15)

programme.title: The City: Its All Who You Know
programme.desc: Whitney goes behind Kelly's back to show her fashion designs to Bergdorf Goodman. Olivia shocks Erin by using her fashion world connections to succeed at her biggest ELLE task. (S1, ep16)

programme.title: Jersey Shore: A New Family
programme.desc: Jersey Shore kicks off when eight soon-to-be roommates move into a summer share. Romance heats up in the house and the guys invite three random girls to join them in the hot tub. (S1, ep1)

programme.title: Jersey Shore: The Tanned Triangle
programme.desc: Feeling like an outcast, Snooki tells the others that she's leaving the Shore. The roommates' first club night out gets flirty. Mike and Sammy's situation turns into a love triangle. (S1, ep2)

programme.title: 48 Hours
programme.desc: When a 17-year-old girl breaks up with her abusive boyfriend, he snaps and breaks into her bedroom to attack her.

programme.title: 48 Hours: Jeffrey MacDonald: Fight for Truth
programme.desc: A report on the 1970 murders of U.S. Army Doctor Jeffrey MacDonald’s pregnant wife and two daughters at their Fort Bragg home. Having served 25 years in prison for the murders, MacDonald still proclaims his innocence.

programme.title: 48 Hours: Death Wish
programme.desc: A report surrounding the July 2009 death of Jeffrey Locker, whose body was found slumped over the steering wheel of his car in Harlem, New York. When authorities tracked Locker’s ATM card to Kenneth Minor, Minor said Locker had begged Minor to kill him.

programme.title: 48 Hours
programme.desc: Whether a true crime television show influenced the investigation of an alleged rape and murder case in Atlanta.

programme.title: 48 Hours: The Strange Life of Dr. Schwartz
programme.desc: The investigation into the murder of a beloved Florida doctor reveals his dark, secret past.

programme.title: 48 Hours: The Hunt for Mr. Wright
programme.desc: A report on George Wright, who was sentenced to prison for the 1962 murder of New Jersey service station owner Walter Patterson, and who after spending 8 years in prison, escaped, and spent 40 years on the run from the authorities.

programme.title: Mission: Impossible: The Numbers Game
programme.desc: Guest star Mai (cq) Britt is a dangerous obstacle when the IMF sets out to learn the number of her husband's Swiss hank account by convincing him World War III has started on Paramount Television Is "Mission: Impossible."

programme.title: Mission: Impossible: The Controllers (Part 1)
programme.desc: Leonard Nimoy and guest star Dina Merrill join the Impossible Missions Force to fight a mind-destroying drug that could enslave the free world in the first of a two-part episode.

programme.title: Mission: Impossible: The Controllers (Part 2)
programme.desc: Jim Phelps lets himself be framed for murder in a scheme to discredit a scientist who has developed a mind-destroying drug in the second of a two-part episode on Paramount Television's "Mission: Impossible."

programme.title: Mission: Impossible: Fool's Gold
programme.desc: Musical comedy star Sally Ann Howes plays a dramatic role as a guest member of the IMF when it sets out to foil a plot to ruin a friendly country with counterfeit money on Paramount Television's "Mission: Impossible."

programme.title: Mission: Impossible: Commandante
programme.desc: To free an imprisoned priest whose life is at stake, Jim Phelps poses as a missionary, Paris becomes a Chinese general and Barney builds a helicopter on Paramount Television's "Mission: Impossible."

programme.title: Barney and Friends: Imagine That!
programme.desc: While Baby Bop and BJ are pretending to be pirates, Barney creates a magical island for their fantastic adventure. Together they discover ways to have fun while playing dress up, pretending, and being silly.

programme.title: Barney and Friends: I'm A Builder
programme.desc: When Baby Bop wonders about the noises she hears, Barney explains that the sounds are from big trucks and machines at a nearby construction site. This inspires BJ to build something himself—a wind-up toy robot.

programme.title: Barney and Friends: Barney and Friends
programme.desc: Baby Bop wants Barney, BJ and the Park Kids to play with her instead of working in a garden. RIFF plays detective to track down the source of a mysterious sound in the Park.

programme.title: Barney and Friends: Magic Caboose - Arts
programme.desc: Melanie is sad because she misses her friend who is visiting relatives in India. Barney shows his friends that it's fun to go to new places and see new things by taking them on an imaginary journey on the Magic Caboose!

programme.title: Barney and Friends: Moving Along
programme.desc: Barney plays a fun game of "Simon Says" with Baby Bop and BJ in the park. They demonstrate how to move their bodies through dancing and playing games.

programme.title: Barney and Friends: All Aboard
programme.desc: Kami, one of Barney's youngest friends, has trouble keeping up with the other kids and she's tired of always being last. She's not having a very good day.

programme.title: Barney and Friends: Barney and Friends
programme.desc: BJ wants to learn Terry's fancy basketball moves. After some advice from Barney, BJ has fun while doing his best! On a campout, Baby Bop sees a falling star and wants to return it to the sky.

programme.title: Barney and Friends: Barney and Friends
programme.desc: When Baby Bop thinks the half-moon is somehow broken, Barney and Friends take an imaginary visit to the moon where Barney eases her concerns.

programme.title: Barney and Friends: Bop Til You Drop - Sharing
programme.desc: The park is especially full of kids today, but all of them are busy playing. Baby Bop can't find anyone to play what she wants to play. When the others notice she is sad, they tell her they will play whatever she suggests.

programme.title: Auction Hunters: Home on the Gun Range
programme.desc: Barely making it to an auction in Corona, CA, Allen and Ton buy an overstuffed unit and find an antique crossbow, a rare 10-gauge Winchester shotgun and a 1940s Kiss-o-Meter.

programme.title: Auction Hunters: The Smoking Ton
programme.desc: WW2 Stuart M3 tank barrel and heavy duty tank treads; rare, collectors' 1890 silver inlayed humidor; high-end industrial meat slicer in the ultimate restaurant unit.

programme.title: Auction Hunters: Reel Money
programme.desc: 1970's-era Fighting Chair used for big-game fishing; military MILES "laser tag" training system.

programme.title: Auction Hunters: Ramped Up
programme.desc: Ton and Allen go head-to-head with their former assistant, Carolyn, while Ton battles a bad back. The guys discover an automatic BB gun and, when negotiations to sell a stunt ramp go south, Allen faces a tough decision.

programme.title: Auction Hunters: Carolyn Goes Topless
programme.desc: A friendly competition with former employee Carolyn turns into a vicious battle for a 1968 Corvette Stingray, giving Carolyn the last laugh. Allen tests his Ninja skills with an antique sickle weapon.

programme.title: Auction Hunters: Top Gun Ton
programme.desc: Scale RC Viper FanJet aircraft with a potent jet engine; 1920s Gundlach Korona large format field camera used for photography expeditions. Ton pilots a plane, but crashes and burns.

programme.title: Auction Hunters: Friends in Hawaii Places
programme.desc: Allen &Ton enlist an assistant, Carolyn, and Allen's Hawaiian buddy, Junior, to help them battle local buyers. The guys find a WWII-era motor scooter and a stash of antique Polynesian tattoo tools that get used on Ton!

programme.title: Auction Hunters: Animal Instincts
programme.desc: The first pump action shotgun - a Winchester Model 1897; a hunter's collection of prize big game, full-body taxidermy.

programme.title: Auction Hunters: Strat'ed for Cash
programme.desc: On a limited budget in the historic L.A. neighborhood of West Adams, Allen and Ton still win three lockers and find a Maui Blue Fender Stratocaster and a 1930s Schwinn bike.

programme.title: Auction Hunters: Nothing But Net
programme.desc: Ton and Allen face their toughest challenge yet when two old rivals join forces. The guys dig up an off-road motorcycle and a pair of net guns, while the staff clashes with mystery shoppers back at Haff Ton Pawn.

programme.title: Auction Hunters: Missouri Loves Company
programme.desc: On a visit to see Ton's sister in Missouri for some rafting and relaxation, the guys hit up a fast-paced live auction. After some tough losses, Ton and Allen score a ballista and an anvil set made for an explosive sport.

programme.title: Teen Mom: Unseen Moments
programme.desc: Dr. Drew hosts an exclusive look at never-before seen laughs, fights and other Season 2 drama with Farrah, Maci, Catelynn, and Amber.

programme.title: Teen Mom: Baby Talk
programme.desc: Maci, Catelynn, Amber and Farrah host a look back at the cutest, most funny, and most difficult baby moments of series 2. They will also discuss their experience as young mothers.

programme.title: Teen Mom: Taking It Slow
programme.desc: Maci confronts her ex about child support; Amber makes a choice; Catelynn and Tyler consider living together; and Farrah considers a big change.

programme.title: Teen Mom: To Be With You

programme.title: Teen Mom: The Last Straw

programme.title: Teen Mom OG

programme.desc: Danny and the team investigate when a young woman's body is found in a Ferrari.

programme.desc: A night out for some drinks descends into a warzone.

programme.desc: Mac goes up against the deputy chief of detectives when a dark secret from the chief's past threatens his reputation and family.

programme.title: CSI: Miami

programme.title: CSI: Miami
programme.desc: The CSIs investigate the murder of a wealthy racehorse owner.

programme.title: CSI: Miami
programme.desc: As the team tackles a case involving a dead doctor, Calleigh falls into a coma.

programme.title: CSI: Miami
programme.desc: New evidence appears that may prove a convicted murderer's innocence.

programme.title: CSI: Miami: G.O.

programme.title: Homicide Hunter: Blood Sisters

programme.title: Homicide Hunter: Into Thin Air
programme.desc: 24yr old Lorraine Laribo is dropped off at a bar by her sister's boyfriend. It's the last time anyone would ever see her alive again. Kenda must use his interrogation skills to find her killer.

programme.title: Homicide Hunter: Death Grip

programme.title: Homicide Hunter: Dead Weight

programme.title: Very Scary People: John Wayne Gacy: Evil Secret (Part 1)
programme.desc: John Wayne Gacy lead a double life in the 1970s. By day, Gacy was a community leader and part time clown, by night, he transformed into a monster who chose young male teens as his prey.

programme.title: The Exes

programme.title: Are We There Yet?: The Lemon Squeeze Episode
programme.desc: Gigi uses an adequate exercise when the family refuses to stop fighting with each other.

programme.desc: Suzanne's overprotective mother arrives and causes tension between her and Nick when she questions Nick's abilities as a husband.

programme.title: Are We There Yet?: The Tit for Tat Episode

programme.title: Are We There Yet?: The Quarantine Episode

programme.title: 48 Hours: Lost in Paradise
programme.desc: In 1976, Deborah Gardner, a Peace Corps worker, was murdered while on assignment in the South Pacific island nation of Tonga. Dennis Priven, a 24-year-old fellow Peace Corps worker, who appeared to be obsessed with Gardner, was charged by Tongan police.

programme.title: 48 Hours: The Hunt for Mr. Wright
programme.desc: A report on George Wright, who was sentenced to prison for the 1962 murder of New Jersey service station owner Walter Patterson, and who after spending 8 years in prison, escaped, and spent 40 years on the run from the authorities.

programme.title: 48 Hours: Dirty Little Secrets
programme.desc: In April 2006, Matt Baker, a pastor from Waco, Texas, returned home to find his wife Kari unconscious, with an empty bottle of Unisom and a suicide note beside her. Police ruled it a suicide. However, her family believed otherwise.

programme.title: 48 Hours: Heroes Under Fire
programme.desc: A fire that ignited in an abandoned warehouse in Worcester, Massachusetts in 1999, claimed the lives of six firefighters. A homeless couple living in the building, were subsequently charged with manslaughter for starting the blaze.

programme.title: 48 Hours: The Blue River Murder
programme.desc: A report on the investigation into the 2010 death of Stephanie Roller, a Colorado mother of three who allegedly went for a walk during a blizzard and was later found dead in a nearby river.

programme.title: 48 Hours: Citizen Jane
programme.desc: When Gertrude McCabe was murdered, her niece Jane Alexander was named her principal beneficiary. Jane, a widow in her 70s, began to suspect that her live-in boyfriend, Tom O'Donnell, might have been involved in the crime.

programme.title: 100 Years of Horror
programme.desc: Many horror legends along with Karloff and Lugosi have taken their turn playing sinister scientists and frightful physicians.

programme.title: 100 Years of Horror
programme.desc: Frankenstein is probably the most famous example of a man-made monster, but a great many other creepy creations have been fashioned by men.

programme.title: 100 Years of Horror

programme.title: 100 Years of Horror

programme.title: Extracurricular: Extracurricular
programme.desc: An entertaining blast of mean-spirited genre thrills, starring Luke Goss (Bros fame). Four high school seniors make a pact to execute a series of perfect, elaborate murders and get some thrills behind them before going to college.

programme.title: Nosferatu
programme.desc: Vampire Count Orlok expresses interest in a new residence and real estate agent Hutter's wife.

programme.title: The Revenge of Frankenstein
programme.desc: Baron Frankenstein escapes from the guillotine and goes to Germany. There, he names himself Dr. Stein and plans to restart his gruesome experiments. Starring: Peter Cushing, Francis Matthews, Eunice Gayson

programme.title: Odd Thomas
programme.desc: In a California desert town, a short-order cook with clairvoyant abilities encounters a mysterious man with a link to dark, threatening forces. Starring: Anton Yelchin, Ashley Sommers, Leonor Varela, Willem Dafoe

programme.title: Farscape: Farscape: S2 E4 - Crackers Don't Matter
programme.desc: A visitor comes on Moya with a device that could cloak Moya. The crew welcomes him on board, but soon almost everyone is acting paranoid.

programme.title: Farscape: Farscape: S2 E5 - The Way We Weren't
programme.desc: Chiana discovers a recording with Moya's original Pilot. After seeing the recording and realizing Aeryn was involved, Pilot orders Aeryn to leave Moya

programme.title: Farscape: Farscape: S2 E6 - Picture If You Will
programme.desc: Chiana buys a picture in a store, which is more than it seems. The picture changes and shows Chiana what will happen to her.

programme.title: Farscape: Farscape: S2 E7 - Home On The Remains
programme.desc: The crew needs food. Zhaan needs to eat meat and starts spewing spores. Only Aeryn seems to have a tolerance for the spores.

programme.title: Farscape: Farscape: S2 E8 - Dream A Little Dream
programme.desc: While waiting for Moya to pick their Transport Pod, Zhaan tells Crichton of Moya's adventures after the Gammak base was destroyed.

programme.title: Farscape: Farscape: S2 E9 - Out Of Their Minds
programme.desc: An alien ship fires a weapon at Moya. The blast makes it through and causes everyone's consciousness to jump into another body.
